snippet.title: Potioneer: The VR Gardening Simulator (Trailer)
snippet.description:
The official trailer for Potioneer: The VR Gardening Simulator.

Plant, nurture, and grow your garden in VR with Potioneer! Moving forward in Early Access, explore the countryside to discover new flora and collect valuable trinkets. Combine harvested materials into potions for special effects!

Play now in Early Access on Steam or itch.io:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/544410
https://focusonfungames.itch.io/potioneer-the-vr-gardening-simulator

Follow me on Twitter: @focusonfungames

Feedback is more than welcome :)
